Description: Display the information of all the turrets (ls) or the turrets of a specific type (ls 'turretType')
Show all the information of the different commands that the player can use
Create a turret of the type indicated in a specific position of the map
Remove all the turrets of the map (rm) or a specific object (rm 'position')
Change the position of a turret, from 'initialPosition' to 'finalPosition'
It shows the data referring to the different types of turrets
